summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6255 for the improvement of 44th Ave. Southwest from Southwest Henderson Street to Southwest Director Street; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 90477, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
